nodes.text: There's the form of a woman carved from marble. The nameplate says that she was Emily Kerson.
Where have I heard that name before? It sounds familiar...
The carving of the woman on this tomb looks more at peace now. I hope that means that Emily and Patrick are happy in the great hereafter.
This is the tomb of Emily Kerson.
I hope that she rests in peace. It doesn't sound like she had a happy life.
There's an epitaph carved on the side of this sarcophagus:
Emily Kerson
Under this tombstone Here I lie bereft with grief and relieved to die For though my heart was caught - He loved me Not.
This must be the final resting place of Patrick the ghost's lost love!

options.text: Place a Rose on the Tomb

nodes.text: Maybe I can give Emily a rose for Patrick...
Who are you? Why have you disturbed my unquiet grave?
I... uh... I just wanted to give you a rose... for Patrick.
Patrick? Patrick Ratan? He truly loves me?
Yes, he loves... loved you. He always wanted to give you a rose.
A rose... Patrick gave me a rose!
Emily... I wanted to tell you... I have always loved you.
Patrick, you were always my one and only. I love you so.
We're together now. We'll always be together forever.
Forever in love.
I hope they are happy together. Forever is a long, long time.
Here's another rose for Emily and Patrick.
Huh? It just disappeared!
I guess they got it!
